T16D4405:342a-0: @342a # // shis par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa /
T16D4405:342a-1: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T16D4405:342a-2: lha yi bkra shis don sgrub cing //
T16D4405:342a-3: phyogs rnams bkra shis byed pa des //
T16D4405:342a-4: khyed kyi don rnams su grub gyur cig / thams
T16D4405:342a-5: cad myur du mthun par shog / phreng ba mgo
T16D4405:342a-7: lag pa g-yas na dpal yod shog / g-yon na'ang
T16D4405:342a-8: dpal ni gnas gyur cig / yan lag kun la'ang
T16D4405:342a-9: dpal yod shog / tshong pa dag ni nor tshol
T16D4405:342a-10: zhing // phyogs bcu dag tu 'gro ba rnams //
T16D4405:342a-11: rnyed pa chen po rnyed gyur cing //
T16D4405:342a-12: de yang bde ba skyed par shog / dgos pa la la gang gi phyir //
T16D4405:342a-13: shar phyogs su ni 'gro ba na //
T16D4405:342a-14: gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi //
T16D4405:342a-15: rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig / smin drug dang ni snar ma dang //
T16D4405:342a-16: mgo dang lag pa nab so dang //
T16D4405:342a-17: rgyal dang skag ces bya ba ste //
T16D4405:342a-18: de dag rnams ni shar phyogs pa //
T16D4405:342a-19: rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni //
T16D4405:342a-20: 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa //
T16D4405:342a-21: shar phyogs logs na yod ces bya //
T16D4405:342a-22: de dag khyed la kun du srungs //
T16D4405:342a-23: de dag bdag po rgyal po ni //
T16D4405:342a-24: yul 'khor srung zhes grags pa ste //
T16D4405:342a-25: de ni dri za kun gyi bdag / nyi ma
T16D4405:342a-26: lhan cig bsrung bar shog / de la bu ni
T16D4405:342a-27: mang yod pa // mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste //
T16D4405:342a-28: dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang //
T16D4405:342a-29: dbang po zhes bya ba'i stobs po che //
T16D4405:342a-30: de rnams khyed la nad med cing //
T16D4405:342a-31: shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig / shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na //
T16D4405:342a-32: lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de //
T16D4405:342a-33: rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ma dang //
T16D4405:342a-34: don grub ma dang mi pham dang //
T16D4405:342a-35: dga' mchog ma dang dga' sde dang //
T16D4405:342a-36: dga' can ma dang dga' 'phel ma //
T16D4405:342a-37: de dag khyed la nad med cing //
T16D4405:342a-38: shes par lhag par skyong bar shog / shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na //
T16D4405:342a-39: gzhi 'dzin zhes bya'i mchod rten yod //
T16D4405:342a-40: rgyal ba skyob pa dgra bcom pa //
T16D4405:342a-41: de rnams kyi ni bzhugs shing mkhyen //
T16D4405:342a-42: de yang khyed la nad med cing //
T16D4405:342a-43: shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig / phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog /
T16D4405:342b-0: @342b khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig / lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas //
T16D4405:342b-1: nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog / dgos pa la la gang gi phyir //
T16D4405:342b-2: lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba na //
T16D4405:342b-3: gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi //
T16D4405:342b-4: rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig / mchu dang gre dang dbo dang ni //
T16D4405:342b-5: me bzhi nag pa lnga pa yin //
T16D4405:342b-6: sa ri dang ni sa ga ste //
T16D4405:342b-7: de dag rnams ni lho phyogs pa //
T16D4405:342b-8: rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni //
T16D4405:342b-9: 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa //
T16D4405:342b-10: lho phyogs logs na yod ces bstan //
T16D4405:342b-11: de dag khyed la kun du srungs //
T16D4405:342b-12: de dag bdag po rgyal po ni //
T16D4405:342b-13: 'phags skyes po zhes bya bar brjod //
T16D4405:342b-14: de ni grul bum kun gyi bdag / gshin rje
T16D4405:342b-15: lhan cig bsrung bar shog / de la bu ni
T16D4405:342b-16: mang yod la // mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste //
T16D4405:342b-17: dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang //
T16D4405:342b-18: dbang po zhes bya stobs po che //
T16D4405:342b-19: de rnams khyed la nad med cing //
T16D4405:342b-20: shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig / lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na //
T16D4405:342b-21: lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de //
T16D4405:342b-22: dpal ldan ma dang grags ldan ma //
T16D4405:342b-23: grags pa thob dang grags 'dzin ma //
T16D4405:342b-24: legs par langs dang rab mnga' dang //
T16D4405:342b-25: legs par sad dang bde bsgrub ma //
T16D4405:342b-26: de dag khyed la nad med cing //
T16D4405:342b-27: shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig / lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na //
T16D4405:342b-28: padma zhes bya'i mchod rten yod //
T16D4405:342b-29: rtag tu gzi brjid kyis kyang 'bar //
T16D4405:342b-30: rtag tu thams cad gsal byed pa //
T16D4405:342b-31: de yang khyed la nad med cing //
T16D4405:342b-32: shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig / phyogs na
T16D4405:342b-33: khyed cag bde bar shog / khyed cag sdig par
T16D4405:342b-34: ma gyur cig / lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs
T16D4405:342b-35: nas // nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog / dgos pa la la gang gi phyir //
T16D4405:342b-36: nub phyogs su ni 'gro ba na //
T16D4405:342b-37: gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi //
T16D4405:342b-38: rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig / lha mtshams dang ni snron dang yang //
T16D4405:342b-39: brtson 'grus brtan ldan snrubs dang ni //
T16D4405:342b-40: chu stod chu smad byi bzhin dang //
T16D4405:342b-41: gro bzhin de ni bdun pa yin //
T16D4405:342b-42: rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni //
T16D4405:342b-43: 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa //
T16D4405:342b-44: nub phyogs logs na yod ces bstan //
T16D4405:342b-45: de dag khyed la kun du srungs //
T16D4405:342b-46: de dag bdag po rgyal po ni //
T16D4405:342b-47: mig mi bzang zhes bya bar shes //
T16D4405:343a-0: de ni klu rnams kun gyi bdag / chu lha lhan cig bsrung @343a * //
T16D4405:343a-1: par shog / de la bu ni mang yod pa //
T16D4405:343a-2: mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste //

T16D4405:343a-6: shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig / nub phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na //
T16D4405:343a-7: lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de //
T16D4405:343a-8: rna cha skra 'dres ma dang ni //
T16D4405:343a-9: padma dkar dang skya rengs dang //
T16D4405:343a-10: cha med gcig dang dgu pa dang //
T16D4405:343a-11: rol dang gnag dang stabs myur srid //
T16D4405:343a-12: de dag khyed la nad med cing //
T16D4405:343a-13: shis par lhag par skyong bar shog / nub phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na //
T16D4405:343a-14: nub ces bya ba'i ri bo yod //
T16D4405:343a-15: nyi ma zla ba gnyis ka'ang nub //
T16D4405:343a-16: nub pa'ang khyed la nor sbyin 'gyur //
T16D4405:343a-17: de yang khyed la nad med cing //
T16D4405:343a-18: shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig / phyogs na
T16D4405:343a-19: khyed cag bde bar shog / khyed cag sdig par
T16D4405:343a-20: ma gyur cig / lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs
T16D4405:343a-21: nas // nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog / dgos pa la la gang gi phyir //
T16D4405:343a-22: byang phyogs su ni 'gro ba na //
T16D4405:343a-23: gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi //
T16D4405:343a-24: rgyu skar khyod la skyong gyur cig / mon gru dang ni mon gra dang //
T16D4405:343a-25: khrums stod dang ni khrums smad dang //
T16D4405:343a-26: nam gru dang ni tha skar dang //
T16D4405:343a-27: bra nye ste ni bdun po yin //
T16D4405:343a-28: rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni //
T16D4405:343a-29: 'jig rten skyong bar grags ldan pa //
T16D4405:343a-30: byang phyogs logs na yod ces bstan //
T16D4405:343a-31: de dag khyed la kun du srungs //
T16D4405:343a-32: de dag bdag po rgyal po ni //
T16D4405:343a-33: mi la zhon pa lus ngan po //
T16D4405:343a-34: gnod sbyin kun gyi bdag po ste //
T16D4405:343a-35: nor bzang lhan cig bsrung bar shog / de la bu ni mang yod pa //
T16D4405:343a-36: mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste //
T16D4405:343a-37: dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang //
T16D4405:343a-38: dbang po zhes bya stobs po che //
T16D4405:343a-39: de dag khyed la nad med cing //
T16D4405:343a-40: shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig / byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na //
T16D4405:343a-41: lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de //
T16D4405:343a-42: rab chags lha mo stong lha mo //
T16D4405:343a-43: sa dang de bzhin padma can //
T16D4405:343a-44: rgyal po che la nyer gnas dang //
T16D4405:343a-45: ri dang khrel yod dpal ldan ma //
T16D4405:343a-46: de dag khyed la nad med cing //
T16D4405:343a-47: shis par lhag par skyong bar shog / byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na //
T16D4405:343a-48: spos ngad ldan pa'i ri bo yod //
T16D4405:343a-49: gnod sbyin 'byung bo rnams kyi gnas //
T16D4405:343b-0: lha mo sna tshogs blta na sdug / de yang khyed la nad med @343b cing ;
T16D4405:343b-1: / shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig / phyogs
T16D4405:343b-2: na khyed cag bde bar shog / khyed cag sdig
T16D4405:343b-3: par ma gyur cig / lha rnams kun gyis rab
T16D4405:343b-4: bsrungs nas // nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po //
T16D4405:343b-5: phyogs bzhi dag na bdun bdun gnas //
T16D4405:343b-6: lha yi bu mo sum cu gnyis ;
T16D4405:343b-7: / phyogs bzhi dag na brgyad brgyad gnas //
T16D4405:343b-8: dge sbyong brgyad dang bram ze brgyad //
T16D4405:343b-9: yul rnams la ni grong rdal brgyad //
T16D4405:343b-10: dbang por bcas pa'i lha brgyang rnams //
T16D4405:343b-11: de dag khyed la kun du srungs //
T16D4405:343b-12: khyed cag 'gro na'ang bkra shis gyur //
T16D4405:343b-13: ldog pa na'ang bkra shis shog /
T16D4405:343b-14: gnyen la lta ba bkra shis shog / gnyen gyis
T16D4405:343b-15: lta ba'ang bkra shis shog / dbang bcas gnod sbyin
T16D4405:343b-16: rgyal che dang // dgra bcom pa dag snying brtse bas //
T16D4405:343b-17: thams cad du ni bkra shis dang //
T16D4405:343b-18: bdud rtsi shis pa thob par shog / tshangs pa dang ni de bzhin nor rgyas dang //
T16D4405:343b-19: zag pa med pa rnam par grol rnams dang //
T16D4405:343b-20: klu dang gnod sbyin rtag tu snying rjes bsrung //
T16D4405:343b-21: ston brgya mtshungs par tshe ni skyong bar shog /'phags
T16D4405:343b-22: pa rgya cher rol ba'i mdo'i tshong dpon ga gon
T16D4405:343b-23: dang bzang po'i le'u las 'byung ba shis par brjod
